hero.title: AutoProvider
hero.subtitle: The Future of Autonomous Companies
hero.description: Unlike traditional AI and Agents, AutoProvider creates fully autonomous companies that operate 24/7 without human intervention. Self-driven, self-organizing, and self-improving.

features.subtitle: Building the world's first truly autonomous companies

autonomous.title: Fully Autonomous
autonomous.description: No human instructions needed. AI-driven decision making and task execution.

selfOrganizing.title: Self-Organizing
selfOrganizing.description: Automatically assigns roles, distributes tasks, and optimizes workflows.

continuous.title: 24/7 Operation
continuous.description: Never stops working. Continuous improvement and goal achievement.

adaptive.title: Self-Improving
adaptive.description: Learns from every interaction and continuously evolves capabilities.

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: AutoProvider is a revolutionary platform that creates fully autonomous companies. Unlike traditional AI and Agents, AutoProvider builds truly self-driven, self-organizing, and self-improving business entities.

keyFeatures.title: Key Features
keyFeatures.autonomous: Fully Autonomous: Decision making without human intervention
keyFeatures.adaptive: Self-Evolution: Learning and improving from every interaction
keyFeatures.scalable: Unlimited Scaling: Automatically expanding capabilities and scope

overview.title: Architecture Overview
overview.description: AutoProvider uses a distributed, modular architecture design ensuring high availability and unlimited scalability.

core.title: Core Components
core.ai: AI Decision Engine: Responsible for autonomous decision making and task planning
